articles.description: With the start of the new year, employers send an email to their employees asking to submit the proofs for investment declaration made during the financial year. This is done to avoid higher tax deducted from salary income. Read on to know the proof you must …
articles.content: Many employers have asked their employees to submit proof of the investments made during the year, to avoid higher tax deduction from salary income. Unlike in the previous years, the income tax laws … [+7509 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Adani Green plans to redeem $750 million bonds due September - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company, part of billionaire Gautam-Adani's ports-to-power conglomerate, said it will pay $169 million from its reserves and internal accruals, and $300 million from the consideration from a joint venture with TotalEnergies Renewables.
articles.content:
Adani Green Energy Ltd said on Monday it plans to redeem $750 million worth of notes due on Sept. 9, eight months before they mature.
The company, part of billionaire Gautam-Adani's ports-to-power c… [+821 chars]

articles.title: Chambal Fertilisers Buyback: Board approves ₹700 crore repurchase via tender offer - CNBCTV18
